CosmereResources.Def.MetalDef.Name: Cosmere_Metal_Lerasium
CosmereResources.Def.MetalDef.label: Lerasium
CosmereResources.Def.MetalDef.description: Lerasium is an exceptionally rare god metal tied to the Shard Preservation. When ingested, it transforms the user into a Mistborn, granting access to all Allomantic powers.
